All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class VolatileAccessEvent
extends FieldAccessEvent

Represents an access to a volatile variable by the target program.

Field Detail

shadow

protected ShadowVolatile shadow
The ShadowVolatile associated with the field being accessed. Decorations on VollatileVariableStates can be used to store info about volatile accesses.
